name: Super Maria Sisters 64
description:
Super Maria Sisters is a 3D Platformer, developed in Unreal Engine 4.27, mainly inspired by Super Mario.

Raffaele Ariano and Giovanni Carnovale are the boys behind this masterpiece. The game was developed as an exam for a Game Dev course.

Your goals as Super Maria are:

  •   Beat the crap out of all the enemies
  •   Pick up all 100 coins
  •   Pick up the star on top of the tower

Each goal will award you with a star. Pick up 3 stars to unlock the true final of Super Maria Sisters!

Feature e Mechanics
  • Jumps!
  • Particles systems!
  • Very smart AI!
  • Unreal crashes! (don't worry, only in editor mode, the build is mega stable!)
  • Realistic sounds!
  • Punches!
  • Superhero Landings!
  • Coins!
  • Very secret speedrunner tricks!
  • WHY DOES UNREAL EDITOR CRASH SO OFTEN OH GOD
Controls

The game is playable with keyboard and mouse or with a xbox controller
